price: (7) We have not heard of this in the latest religion.[1319] This is not but a fabrication.
arabic: مَا سَمِعۡنَا بِهَٰذَا فِي ٱلۡمِلَّةِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا ٱخۡتِلَٰقٌ
footnotes: [1319]- Referring to Christianity or possibly the pagan religion of the Quraysh.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: mā samiʿ'nā bihādhā fī al-milati al-ākhirati in hādhā illā ikh'tilāqun
